entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
